import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { fetchUsers } from '../redux/contacts/actions' const Contacts = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { users } = useSelector(state => state.contacts) useEffect(() => { if (!users.length) dispatch(fetchUsers()) }, []) return <>
